title: Data Shows Carbon Dioxide Emissions Likely to Reach Record High in 2022
description: Global emissions from fossil fuels are likely to reach record highs this year, new data shows, putting nations further off track from stopping global warming.
dc:creator: Brad Plumer

media:content.media:description: A coal mine in Uttar Pradesh, India, which accounts for 8 percent of the worldâ€™s carbon dioxide emissions. China is responsible for 32 percent, the United States 14 percent and the European Union 8 percent.
